content.prompt: Which of the following is the most serious limitation of the table as a source of information on the comparative military capabilities of nuclear powers?

choices.label: It does not include data on the total destructive power of the nuclear stockpiles of each nation.
It does not include data on the economic output (gross domestic product) of each nation.
It does not include data on the number of people in each nation injured or killed by weapons of mass destruction.
It does not include data on the average life expectancy of the population of each nation.

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain how claims or evidence support, modify, or refute a source's argument.
